product_name: Native Eyewear Highline Reflex Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Style meets function in the Native Eyewear Highline Reflex Polarized sunglasses. They have the optical quality to back up their great looks and feature a specialized Reflex coating for clarity. Asphalt frames come with polarized blue (gray-tinted) Reflex lenses that are ideal for bright conditions. Stout Fade frames come with polarized bronze (brown-tinted) Reflex lenses for very bright conditions. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity, and block 100% of harmful UVA and UVB light. Reflex lenses block 40% of infrared light to decrease eye fatigue, offer blue light filtering and 100% UV protection to minimize haze and enhance clarity. Lenses and lightweight, yet durable frames are built to withstand a high-velocity impact. Frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Self-adjusting nosepads and ear stems create a nonslip grip that keeps sunglasses in place. Temple ends hug your ears to keep sunglasses in place. Cam-action spring hinges quickly lock temples into position. Native Eyewear Highline Reflex Polarized sunglasses include a protective case and a soft pouch that doubles as a cleaning cloth. Frames best fit medium to large profiles.
short_description: Style meets function in the Native Eyewear Highline Reflex Polarized sunglasses. They have the optical quality to back up their great looks and feature a specialized Reflex coating for clarity.
